title: Alex Holder | Trump's Plan to Avoid Criminal Charges by Running for President Again: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Donald Trump reportedly planning to run for president again as a way to protect himself from a possible criminal indictment related to the attempted coup on January 6.

Then, Alex Holder talks about working with the Trump family on the documentary series Unprecedented, getting subpoenaed by the January 6 committee and coming to the conclusion that Donald Trump truly believes he won the 2020 election.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
